Localization.Name: Threshold Copperhead Pants
Localization.Description: Carrying Capacity: 0.5K µSCU\n\nThe company's classic pant, the Threshold line features a glossy faux-organic exterior, an attached belt with real metal buckle, and reinforced knee and shin pads. Additionally, the pants are decorated with non-constructive stitching and include two hip pockets. The Copperhead edition features golden accents on knee and shin pads.
